Thank you very much for your formal application. We deeply appreciate your thorough research into our program and your recognition that our focus on fostering independence and self-directed learning aligns perfectly with your goals.

After careful consideration of your family's profile and commitment, we are delighted to inform you that we are extending an offer of placement at Nursery_B. We look forward to partnering with you and welcoming your child into our community. Please confirm your acceptance immediately to secure this spot.

conversation.message:
Hello Parent_E! We are absolutely delighted to hear that you remain highly enthusiastic about joining our community. We truly value the depth of our conversations.

Regarding the application process, the criteria are quite straightforward. We require the standard enrollment documentation, including the application form, immunization records, and verification of residency. Crucially, as we operate on a limited quota system, the primary 'criteria' we prioritize is the timeliness of the formal application submission, especially for families like yours who have demonstrated such a strong alignment with our school's philosophy. We encourage you to submit your formal application documents at your earliest convenience, as we would be thrilled to offer you the remaining spot. Please let us know if you are ready to proceed to the formal application stage.
